"Team Merger":
"\"Team Merger\" is a feature that allows two Teams to become one.

The combined Team inherits the members and Team Points from both Teams, without either having to be disbanded."

"To perform a merge, the Team Master of the main Team must send a request to the Team Master of the Team to be absorbed, and the merge will be completed when the other Team's Team Master accepts.

※If the combined number of members exceeds 100, or there are items in Team Storage, the Teams cannot be merged."

"When the Team Master has agreed to the merger, their Team Points are added to the main Team's Team Point total.

※All members of the absorbed Team will become Visitors in the main Team."
